summary: Project now includes a UI theming update: implement a dark blue theme with deep blue accents and darker backgrounds.

existing_features.title: Update the app theme tokens to a dark blue palette so dark mode uses deep blue accents and darker blue-tinted backgrounds while maintaining readable contrast for text and UI surfaces (cards, popovers, dialogs, sidebar). Apply the changes via the existing CSS variable tokens used by Tailwind (e.g., in frontend/src/index.css) so the updated palette propagates across all pages and components consistently.
Make dark mode the default theme used by the app ThemeProvider so users see the dark blue theme by default on first load (including authenticated app routes and the public search route).

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a dark blue color theme (deep blue, darker backgrounds)

projectName: Apply dark blue theme across the UI (deep blue accents, darker backgrounds)
